context_bundle.summary: etcd is distributed, reliable key-value store for critical data: Uses Raft consensus for strong consistency, watch API for real-time updates, lease-based TTL for ephemeral keys, gRPC API. Used by Kubernetes for cluster state, leader election, distributed locking.

onboarding.quick_start: etcd is distributed, reliable key-value store for critical data: Uses Raft consensus for strong consistency, watch API for real-time updates, lease-based TTL for ephemeral keys, gRPC API. Used by Kubernetes for cluster state, leader election, distributed locking.
common_patterns: Service discovery: Register with health check, query via DNS or HTTP
KV store: Watch for config changes, atomic compare-and-swap
Leader election: Create session with TTL, acquire lock, renew lease
Health checks: HTTP endpoint, TCP port, script execution
